author: Olivia Petter, Olivia Petter
title: Coronavirus: Australian state backtracks on rule just 48 hours after banning live-apart couples from seeing each other
description: 'Sensible, good and clear decision,' writes Twitter user
content:
Couples in Victoria, Australia who live apart are no longer banned from seeing each other, the states chief health officer has said.
On 30 March, the state imposed a strict stay at home order that prevented people from leaving their homes with few exceptions… [+1476 chars]
